SwapandSell.Name: Post a Swap or Sell
SwapandSell.Title: Post to Swap or Sell
SwapandSell.BodyCopy:
WOGBB members can easily buy, sell or trade birds, equipment, books, etc. Simple fill out your advertisement below and click "Post". A message will automatically post to WOGBB's Swap and Sell page. Postings expire after 6 months.

Rules:

  1. It is not OK to contact members about other unsolicited services, products or commercial interests.
  2. WOGBB reserves the right to remove any posts deamed inappropriate.
  3. WOGBB membership and secure member login required to view this page.
SwapandSell.FacebookPostCopy: A member has posted a Swap and Sell request on WOGBB.com
